name: @milaidy/capacitor-talkmode
description: Talk mode plugin with STT, chat, and TTS for Milaidy

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs
scripts.build:docs: npm run clean && npm run docgen && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs

platformDetails.browser: Support via Web Speech API for STT/TTS. No ElevenLabs streaming (CORS). System TTS fallback.
platformDetails.node: Full support via Electron with ElevenLabs streaming TTS, native STT, and system TTS fallback
